CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use initial blocky rendering
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Performing a first pass with large pixel blocks gets a rough image faster but makes the full render take longer.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show render times
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Display the time of each render once complete.

ListPreference.android:title: Mandelbrot Set colouring scheme
ListPreference.android:summary: Colours are determined by how many iterations it takes to eliminate a point from the Mandelbrot Set.

ListPreference.android:title: Julia Set colouring scheme
ListPreference.android:summary: Colours are determined by how many iterations it takes to eliminate a point from the Julia Set.

ListPreference.android:title: Julia pin colour
ListPreference.android:summary: The colour of the circles pinpoint the current Julia fractal in the Mandelbrot.
